snippet: Friday’s highlights from around the web include looks at the National Security Agency’s efforts to crack all encryption, why people skills — not only computer skills — are important for founders of start-ups and a shark-tracking by Twitter...
abstract: Friday’s highlights from around the web include looks at the National Security Agency’s efforts to crack all encryption, why people skills — not only computer skills — are important for founders of start-ups and a shark-tracking by Twitter post.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Facebook Privacy and Sharks on Twitter
